items.title: PLTR: Palantir Soars to All-Time High on AI Momentum

items.title: HP OmniBook X Flip 2-in-1 Laptop: 16" 1200p IPS Touch, Ryzen AI 5 340, 16GB RAM $530 + Free Shipping
items.summary: HP OmniBook X Flip 2-in-1 Laptop with 16" 1200p IPS touch display, Ryzen AI 5 340 processor, and 16GB RAM is available for $530 with free shipping. The laptop features AMD FreeSync technology and a 360-degree multitouch-enabled IPS display.

items.title: Man Arrested for Threatening to Kill Marjorie Taylor Greene: Prosecutors
items.summary: A Maryland man was arrested for making death threats against Republican Rep. Marjorie Taylor Greene and her family. The threats were allegedly AI-generated, raising ethical concerns about the use of technology for criminal activities.
